name: Deterioration (KianT952)
description:
Set in the Mid 90’, this story focuses on the main protagonist who one night wakes up beside his computer to an email from an anonymous user. In this email, is a link to a free to play downloadable game *Demon Buster*. The character is curious and decides to download it unbeknownst to the consequences ahead. He then wakes up after a few hours to the game's title appearing on his computer screen. He sits down at his computer desk and loads up the game...

Created by:

Riley Lloyd

Zach Lloyd

Kian Thomas

Omer Mert Safakogullari

Oliver Martin
